Failed attempts to get color 

.. ipython:: python::

  import readline
  import colorama
  import sphinx.quickstart
  colorama.init()
  import sys
  print(sys.version)
  import IPython
  print("This IPython is version:",IPython.__version__)
  print("\x1b[31;1mthis is a bold red prompt> \x1b[m")
